name: Flight
description:
Jump in the air to spread your wings and take flight! Be careful not to damage them or get them caught in things, or you may be grounded for a while.

Manually disable/enable with your primary power to fly with equipment.

text: Jump while in the air to fly. Press [

badges.text: Requires a half block clearance on either side and above to spread your wings
Fall slowly and land gracefully unless exhausted
